1.name: Operating Systems and Terminal Knowledge
1.desc: Build a strong foundation in Linux fundamentals and command-line operations. Master essential skills for server management, task automation, and system administration.

2.name: Learn Programming and Scripting
2.desc: Master fundamental programming concepts with focus on automation and scripting for DevOps workflows.

3.name: Version Control Systems (Git)
3.desc: Learn to track code changes, manage branches, and collaborate effectively in team environments using version control.

4.name: CI/CD Tools
4.desc: Implement automated pipelines for testing, building, and deploying applications to ensure rapid and reliable software delivery.

5.name: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
5.desc: Learn to provision and manage cloud infrastructure through code for consistent and repeatable deployments.

6.name: Cloud Providers
6.desc: Gain foundational knowledge in cloud computing, focusing on core services for deploying and scaling applications.

7.name: Containerization and Orchestration
7.desc: Master container technologies to package and run applications consistently across different environments.

8.name: Monitoring and Logging
8.desc: Set up comprehensive system monitoring and logging to maintain system health and troubleshoot issues effectively.
